attributes.action: Support Year 10 and 12 students with 2022 exams by being favourable with grading
attributes.additional_details: Some students received teacher assessed grades for GCSEs and then struggled with online learning and yet face difficult A level exams with only a year of proper teaching available. More support should be given and grading should be favourable as there is little time for learning and no examinations for two years prior.
attributes.background: Learners have been learning online and struggling due to Covid-19 and should be given support with A levels and GCSEs for the first year after exam cancellations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
